Name: Xyla and the 'Shrooms of Doom
About the game: Xyla is a pink haired hero who was raised as an elite Forest Agent. She realised early on in her life that dedication to her jumping and shooting skills would lead her to success. Work with Xyla as she navigates the unpredictable terrain of the forest. Xyla’s unique jumping and flying techniques allow movement not only the traditional left to right movement but allows Xyla to explore maps in a in a way that uses the whole screen to it’s fullest potential.
